How Evil Colt is
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: How Evil Colt is
By blackdevil on Tuesday, August 15, 2006 - 04:36 am:

To the tune of Frosty the Snowman


Coltia is evil
she scolds all the monsters
for no good reason
they hate her so
bury her alive......


XDDDDDDD this is special!!!!!

By blackdevil on Wednesday, August 16, 2006 - 03:26 pm:

this is so fun!!!!i love making fun of colt!!!
(that's right people,laugh all you want at coltia,but remember that without her.....your monsters would be much happier!!!!!!either that or they wouldn't exist,so....either way....COLT IS EVIL!!!!!)
